productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 216 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work when they work.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for Classified figures. I had a few figures out (classified, 1 black series, one ML) and the pegs didn't work. The build quality was good. Solid plastic, didn't feel cheap. But the pegs just weren't the right size. Tried a few more figures and I found a couple that worked. Figured I'd write a review for 1 or 2 stars and return them. Decided to check out a few more Marvel Legends figures and got a lot more that worked. Tried multiple bases on figures that worked and they'd always fit that figure. So the build quality and tolerances on these stands is great. It's just the peg hole size consistency between figures is not the same, so some will work and some will not. You could probably sand the peg down or drill out the foot if you felt like putting that much effort in. It appears the peg is metric and US drill bits are imperial so it won't be a perfect fit. I did drill out one foot and wasn't too impressed with the results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These stands work great for GI Joe classified, Star Wars black series and Action Force. They are well made and sturdy. I especially like the clear stands the best. The only problems I have found.... The figures themselves are the problem ... the peg holes are often too small and/or too shallow. The Star wars black series being the main culprit. Happy collecting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected.
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews I was a tad sceptic to buy these. I read the pegs were too big for GI Joe Classified. One guy even said that he drilled out the feet of his figures. I got these anyway because I know how to fix these sorts of issues with Joe stands. That said all of these fit exactly as the are supposed to. All you need to do is press down & lightly twist back & forth a tad & they go right on, no heating required, no drilling, exc. In fact they fit exactly like the stands that come with the Walmart exclusive cardback 6 inch Joes. Because these figures use soft flexible plastic they need the stands to be somewhat tight on the feet. That is just the nature of the beast so to speak. I have to question the motive behind some of these comments because the reality is that these stands are near perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great deal for army builders.
reviews.reviewText: I like these stands they fit tight in gi joe classified feet but I do wish they would make a more square shape stand so it had extra stability in both axis (front to back and side to side).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for getting your figures to stand up*
reviews.reviewText: These are great for getting your action figures to stand up..... but the pegs are slightly too small for every figure that I have tried. A simple solution was to take an X-Acto Knife and shave the peg down just slightly to get them to fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Built well but you might to lightly sand the pegs for some figures
reviews.reviewText: These are great. I got the mixed set of rectangles and circles, which I will recommend so you have options. You might need to do a very small amount of sanding of the pegs for some figures, but this is not a fault of the pegs. Some figures from the same manufacturers just have smaller foot holes. I'm using them for 6 inch NECA TMNT, Hasbro Classified, and some Star Wars Black Figures so you can get a lot of use out of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save Your Money: Not compatible with GI Joe, Star Wars
reviews.reviewText: These stands have round pegs, but GI Joe Classified & Star Wars Black figures have hexagonal pegs in their feet. The stand pegs are larger than the holes in the feet and I'm not about to jam them on to make them fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This stand is too big for my figures only works with old he-man figures
reviews.reviewText: These are don’t fit as they say period I try on many different figures only one works on is origins of master of the universe figures . I did trim them down with a box cutter and I got them to fit most of my figures like new He- man’s ,gi joes classified , marvels legend & some others . It’s not bad price but having to trim them up to work takes time when it be easier if they fit from start I wanted to use them to set up my figure collection .
